description: Situated in the heart of Alghero and with a beautiful veranda overlooking the sea, this restaurant serves delicious fish and seafood made from top-quality ingredients. Highlights include the “Alessandrina” fried fish and the octopus salad. If available, make sure you try the goats’ cheese made by the owner himself, although be warned – the flavour is quite strong!
